content: Entertaining for short bursts of gameplay! Levels are placed nicely enough to play one level in a short burst, remain fully engaged in the haunting atmosphere, and take a break afterwards. Good soundtrack choices and jump scares to keep you on the edge of your seat! I will definitely be playing through Ailment after this, and looking forward to whatever else comes next!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review Christian !!!

content: Something new fun game
Fantastic game! Great gameplay and it feels like you are on a cool sci-fi mission. Awesome game!!

content: This game sums up why I love indie developers fun game funny jokes and great story and great music

content: Underrated game! story is admirable, controls are easy, difficulty set to hardcore makes the game even more fun. My slight concerns lie with the stat allocations since i almost maxed out all stats, it would've better to just be able to allocate until 100 and yet still gain from those you find in lockers. A.I needs more improvement since they often get in the way during battles and overall exploration, guns are fun to use but gets boring in latter stages since most guns have low dmg/fire rate.
Pretty sold game and gameplay. I am having fun with it. Is their a way to see the gun stats after pickup to compair or just find the guns in the store and check that way?
replyContent: Yeah, you can only check it in the gun shop

content: Mission 2/28 not much to say except the game tends to feel a bit laggy as compared to having dialogues, the buffs you get only enhances the base gun and not your entire arsenal. Movement feels a bit difficult especially when faced with numerous enemies. But overall an interesting game.
Awesome atmosphere!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: I like it!
Just a great overall game
A fantastic premium game a lot of fun. I play with my Dualshock 4 controller.
Please add an option to stay at the current level. I would like to explore all levels to 100% but when I encounter the door, I drop to the next level without any warning.
Loving this game! Fun and funny with challenge and a great story besides! Keep up the good work please!

content: SciFi-Horror + pixel art? Well, this was a no-brainer - Saw the pictures, bought it right away and breezed through it in a few hrs. So it's not a long game but a fun one, I liked it a lot. Controls are simple but accurate and there's a decent # of weapons. Since the shooting's good, a MP mode would be nice and give the game some replay value. Only thing I didn't like - Levels where you just run from/to s.th. First one's ok but since there's never any real threat, it's not that exciting

This game is great, I don't usually do reviews but I like it how it is challenging along with the quirky jokes and the dialogue is good at explaining what's going on one piece at a time. If you're not a fast reader then there's an option to pause but usually there's ample time to read.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Nice to play. Survival and pixel art.
So far, so fun! Would love to have an option for controller support. Then we could make this a true twin stick shooter. As it is the auto aim works wonderfully well. Great fun.
replyContent: Thanks Ryan, there's already Gamepad support! try it out!
